titleStmt.title: A narration of the late accident in the New-Exchange, on the 21. and 22. of November, 1653. Stylo vet. Written by the most noble and illustrious Lord, Don Pantaleon Sa, brother to his excellency of Portugall, extraordinary legate in England, to his much esteemed nobilitie of England, and to all of the beloved and famous City of London, from Newgates prison.
titleStmt.author: Sá, Pantaleão, d. 1654.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
